data.message: How awesome!!!!! Go Doug!!!! I bet most the people half your age would kill to have your zest for life!!!! All the best,and if you are down my way,there is plenty of room!!!We live at Warnervale,on the Central Coast,NSW. My name is Wendy Whitford!!! And i am sure there will be a real shindig to celebrate your arrival,as the people around here in the rural parts are wonderful!!!!! Good luck!!! xxxx
